Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

Docs.summary: Reads the [deviceFilters Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/2fb323b9-675b-48de-861b-8998fa0c51ba) section of a configuration file that specifies the set of device filters for use with ASP.NET mobile controls. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
Docs.permission: for operating in a hosted environment. Demand value: ; Permission value: .

block.para: Instances of classes that inherit the class must be thread safe and stateless. The method must be callable from multiple threads simultaneously. See for more information about inheriting.

Docs.summary: Creates a dictionary of the device filter information contained in the specified by the parameter. If the object referenced by the property is not , then dictionary entries are appended to the parent dictionary. This method supports the .NET Framework infrastructure. This API is obsolete.
